bibl.title: "This is not a true story": Stesichorus's Palinode and the Revenge of the Epichoric. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The language of the Palinode situates Stesichorus's work in opposition to epic and Panhellenic versions of the story of Helen.
bibl.seg: BEECROFT Alexander J., "This is not a true story": Stesichorus's Palinode and the Revenge of the Epichoric. Avec résumé en anglais.
The language of the Palinode situates Stesichorus's work in opposition to epic and Panhellenic versions of the story of Helen.
